name: Undeath Ward
text: You create a pale silver barrier that repels undead. Mindless undead and intelligent undead with fewer Hit Dice than your caster level cannot enter the area or penetrate the barrier. Undead of Hit Dice equal to or greater than your caster level can pass through this barrier by making a successful Will save against the spell, but as they do so, they take 3d6 points of damage. Once an undead creature makes its save against this spell and takes this damage, it can come and go without further penalty. This spell may only be used defensively, not aggressively. Forcing an undeath ward against creatures that the spell keeps at bay collapses the barrier.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料/法器 (银粉)
area_zh: 以你为中心, 10尺半径发散区域
savingThrow_zh: 无 或 抑制, 通过则无效; 见文本
text_zh: 你创造了一道苍银色的屏障斥退不死生物。无心制与有智力的不死生物，如果生命骰低于你的施法者等级，那就无法进入或穿透这层屏障。生命骰数等渔或大于你施法者等级的不死生物，可以进行一次意志豁免检定，如果成功，就可以穿越这层瓶制，但如果它们这么做，会受到3d6点伤害。当一名不死生物进行了意志检定又承受了法术的伤害，那么它之后的来来去去都不会受到更多的惩罚。这法术只能用来防御，不能用来进攻。如果使用本法术来迫使屏障转而去攻击生物，那这层屏障就会崩塌。
